comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: Frenz!! You guys are awesome. Thanks so much for coming out to my defense (yes, I passed...!). It was so nice having such great friendly peeps in the audience. Rock on! -Adriana

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Adriana, You were outstanding this morning... Great, great job! We knew in the first 5 minutes that you would pass. Congratulations!! DU
